title: Putin has decided to invade Ukraine, Biden says, and will likely target its capital
content:
1. Putin has decided to invade Ukraine, Biden says, and will likely target its capital  The Washington Post
  2. Russia-Ukraine: Biden says he is 'convinced' Putin will invade: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  3. Biden gives updates on Russia-Ukraine crisis following call with allies | full video  CBS News
  4. The latest on the Ukraine-Russia border crisis: Live updates  CNN
  5. Watch Live: Biden to Address Ukraine Border Crisis  The New York Times
contentSnippet:
Putin has decided to invade Ukraine, Biden says, and will likely target its capital  The Washington Post

localize.title: プーチンはウクライナに侵攻することを決定し、その首都を標的にする可能性が高いとバイデン氏は言う。
拜登说，普京已决定入侵乌克兰，并可能将其首都作为攻击目标
拜登說，普京已決定入侵烏克蘭，並可能將其首都作爲攻擊目標
